name: Greater Weapon of the Chosen
prerequisiteFormula: all("Worship and receive spells from a deity",!@feat:greater_weapon_of_the_chosen)

description.text: Your deity guides your hand when you fight with her favored weapon.

sections.Benefit: When you use your deity's favored weapon to attempt a single attack with the attack action, you roll two dice for your attack roll and take the higher result. You do not need to use your Weapon of the Chosen feat to gain this feat's benefit. As usual, the reroll does not apply to any confirmation rolls.
